pr_title: refactor(e2e): Add sdk logging to all test runs

timeline.message: refactor(e2e): Add sdk logging to all test runs

timeline.bodyText: We don't really do different log levels in our e2e test packages, so I'm leaving this as DEBUG
timeline.author: timtay-microsoft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,4 +5,10 @@ log4j.rootLogger=ERROR, stdout
 log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender
 log4j.appender.stdout.Target=System.out
 log4j.appender.stdout.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
-log4j.logger.tests.integration.com.microsoft.azure.sdk.* = DEBUG 
\ No newline at end of file
+log4j.logger.tests.integration.com.microsoft.azure.sdk.* = DEBUG
